paragraphs.body: This category exists to organize Avatar Wiki pages (articles and community pages) and assist in navigating to them. It is the top category on Avatar Wiki, and all categories should be accessible from here, or through sub-categories.

paragraphs.body: This is an index of categorized articles, rather than a list of all articles.
